wybug_title: 爱聊手机打电话软件XSS进后台，权限多，可深入了解数万妹子信息。
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-11：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2013-08-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 爱聊手机打电话软件XSS进后台一枚 详细说明：  玩IOS，看91手机上的社交软件，这款应用下载量蛮大，好几十万，于是下载之，提交反馈处 写入XSS代码，盲打得到cookie和后台

进入后台界面

于是乎。。。http://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/addclass.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/addadmin.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/addnews.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/admin.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/bbs1.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/black.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/call.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/delnews.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/editnews.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/freeze.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/friend.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/function.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/login.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/logout.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/news.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/savenews.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/ub.asphttp://account.iicall.com/qwerasdfa2134sdfx/updateuser.asp本来想继续深入，获取妹子手机和QQ号，想想点到为止，就不继续了。未深入，请及时修补。   漏洞证明：  玩IOS，看91手机上的社交软件，这款应用下载量蛮大，好几十万，于是下载之，提交反馈处 写入XSS代码，盲打得到cookie和后台
